ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have no idea on rez, never had rez casted on my or seen it casted on anyone yet.  Who knows I might be Lvl 20 by the end of next week and have my last name
ygData.messageBody:
I have no idea on rez, never had rez casted on my or seen it casted on
anyone yet. Who knows I might be Lvl 20 by the end of next week and have my
last name and so cooler spells. I'm luck to have half of Lvl 15, got killed
two times by mino's today. Both times I got jumped by two Mino's at the
same time and couldn't get away or get help in time. Hope that doesn't
happen again for a long time. But good luck on get Lvl 40!

**************************
Azor
Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> no lev 2 rez is supposed to give you i think at least half of what you got
> back....lv 3 is supposed to give you almost all of what you lost back
>
> Azor wrote:
>
> > From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > Well congrats on Lvl 39, as for Rez I have no idea cause I'm only on Lvl
15
> > almost 16. But maybe cause you just got it and it doesn't do as good
when
> > you first get it? That might be it or just a bug or it did give those
few
> > ppl exp back, I don't think it gives ya a good bit back just a little
bit
> > and maybe they just couldn't tell.
> >
> > **************************
> > Azor
> > Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> > **************************
